episodes.title: Shakahola Probe-Paul McKenzie: Mr. Michael Mwaria, land surveyor with the Ministry of Land, Nairobi
episodes.description:
Mr. Michael Mwaria, a land surveyor with the Ministry of Land in Nairobi, told the court how they received a request from the Directorate of Criminal Investigations to submit GPS coordinates of structures in Shakahola.  

He told the court that he was part of a team of surveyors to implement the request by the Directorate of Criminal Investigations. 

The exercise involved mapping all structures in Shakahola, including houses, water pans, holding bays, and graves (exhumed and non-exhumed).
